about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a almost graduated student whom is interested in IT and everything to do with programming. That's why I chose to study Information and Communication Technologies at Thomas More (Belgium) & JAMK (Finland). Just writing a program form scratch based on the needs of a friend, parent or client, is the thing I like the most.
about.paragraph2: With a second bachelor, I hope to improve my communication, team-skills and general knowledge. Of course programming is not the only thing I do. Judo will be always close to my heart, but jumping into a swimming pool is also not bad!
about.paragraph3: My personality is having fun and make new friends and finish what I've started. I try to be engaged in all extra events in and out of school, ex. donating blood or tutoring or join the student union's board.

footer.emailErrorPattern: This is not a valid email.
footer.emailErrorEmail: This is not a valid email.

geo.name: Geolocation
geo.paragraph1: This project was made in my free time. My father collaborates with the archive of Geel (Belgium), and he wanted a way to show where a plot used to be located. For now this project is still a startup, because there are 6 other maps left to reference.
geo.paragraph2: Working at this project I have learned how to reference an old map with a more up‐to‐date map or vice versa. This project was made in QGIS which has a lot to offer. With this programme you can reference, draw shape layers, select data, and a possibility to export it.

lm.name: LM-Sounds
lm.paragraph1: LM-Sounds is a website made for a friend. We started talking about websites and how he always needed one. Because I want to help and with my background in IT I was interested in creating one, so I started making a MoSCoW to prioritize what was needed.
lm.paragraph2: I really enjoyed this project, not only to create a website but also to help a friend and support him in the long run. We also keep the website up to date and try to make sure the hosting is always online.

br.name: Beverage Rater
br.paragraph1: During this project I learned working with figma and prioritizing the important parts of an application. Using figma for this made it easier to select a color-palette and made it easier to turn your idea into a application.
br.paragraph2: Thanks to this project I really learned how to sketch an idea and make it user-friendly, so it can be easily accessible for a visitor. Also, it was important to follow your time schedule.

f1.name: F1-Stats
f1.paragraph1: The project started with an API I found on the internet, but it took way too long until it was updated. So the next logical step for me was to create my own. I first started drawing my database, so I know what I needed to store. The next step was creating my back-end and later the front-end.
f1.paragraph2: During this project I've learned a lot of new ways to code, or technologies to use, which I discovered in my internship. The next thing I have tried to understand was hosting. For the first time I hosted my application on Amazon Web Services, it took a while until I figured things out.
